column4: hello, does anyone know how i can fix packages.freecontrib.org timing out when i try to upgrade ubuntu from 6.06 to 6.10?
Last I hear they stopped the Ubuntu repo at freecontrib.
I told yo that freecontrib doesn't have an Ubuntu repo right now.
They are in the process of turning it over to new management, but it doesn't work right now.
You might as well comment out the freecontrib repos for now.
Do you have me on ignore?
pastebin your /etc/apt/sources.list file and I'll help with that
If it were me, I'd reinstall Ubuntu amd never touch automatix.
You can download the Edgy cd and install that. Then upgrade to Fesity when it comes out.
If you want to preserve your boot menu, copy the /boot/grub/menu.lst file to a usb key or burn it to cd or something, it's really easy to restore it later.
Copy that file to be in with the files you are backing up.
Well, that is an issue that is quickly and easily fixed.. with the gurus in this channel :)
Yes, those settings are for all the apps you use
Are you in gnome or kde?
